name: City Ambulance Mission 3D
description:
City Ambulance Mission 3D!!!
Your duty is to pick up the seriously injured person in emergency from accidental spots and for medical treatment take them to the nearest hospital. your role as a real on-duty ambulance driver to rescue injured citizens on multiple places.
How to Play:
Tilt or Touch to steer
Touch gas button to accelerate
Touch brake button to slow down
Features:
Tons of hardcore challenging levels
Great dynamic game play
race against the clock,
